flavorText: When the battle is over, the bitterest foes at last find common ground.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn der Kampf vorüber ist, teilen sich auch die schlimmsten Feinde eine letzte Ruhestätte.
foreignData.name: Ruf der Grausamen Kapitänin
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Pirat-Karte aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Mache dann dasselbe mit je einer Vampir-, Dinosaurier- und Meervolk-Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando la batalla termina, los enemigos más encarnizados a veces terminan compartiendo tu punto de vista.
foreignData.name: Llamada de la capitana siniestra
foreignData.text: Regresa una carta de Pirata de tu cementerio a tu mano. Luego, haz lo mismo con un Vampiro, un Dinosaurio y un Tritón.

foreignData.flavorText: À la fin du combat, les ennemis les plus acharnés se trouvent enfin un point commun.
foreignData.name: Appel du capitaine sinistre
foreignData.text: Renvoyez dans votre main une carte de pirate depuis votre cimetière, puis faites de même avec un vampire, un dinosaure et un ondin.

foreignData.flavorText: Una volta terminata la battaglia, anche i nemici più irriducibili trovano infine un terreno comune.
foreignData.name: Chiamata della Capitana Lugubre
foreignData.text: Riprendi in mano una carta Pirata dal tuo cimitero, poi fai lo stesso con un Vampiro, un Dinosauro e un Tritone.

foreignData.flavorText: 戦闘が終わって初めて、最も手ごわかった敵に共通点が生まれる。
foreignData.name: 不気味な船長の召集
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地から海賊・カード１枚をあなたの手札に戻す。その後、吸血鬼と恐竜とマーフォークについて同様のことを行う。

foreignData.flavorText: 전투가 끝나면, 서로 증오하던 원수들이 마침내 같은 입장이 된다.
foreignData.name: 음산한 선장의 부름
foreignData.text: 해적 카드 한 장을 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린 후, 흡혈귀와 공룡, 인어에 대해서도 똑같이 한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Quando a batalha termina, os inimigos mais ferrenhos finalmente encontram algo em comum.
foreignData.name: Chamado da Capitã Sinistra
foreignData.text: Devolva um card de Pirata de seu cemitério para sua mão, e em seguida, faça o mesmo com um Vampiro, um Dinossauro e um Tritão.

foreignData.flavorText: Когда заканчивается бой, даже самые непримиримые враги вместе ложатся в одну землю.
foreignData.name: Воззвание Мрачного Капитана
foreignData.text: Верните карту Пирата из вашего кладбища в вашу руку, затем сделайте то же самое для Вампира, Динозавра и Мерфолка.

foreignData.flavorText: 战斗结束后，不共戴天的仇敌终有机会携手共眠。
foreignData.name: 司命召令
foreignData.text: 将一张海盗牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后对吸血鬼牌、恐龙牌和人鱼牌执行同样流程。

foreignData.flavorText: 戰鬥結束後，不共戴天的仇敵終有機會攜手共眠。
foreignData.name: 司命召令
foreignData.text: 將一張海盜牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上，然後對吸血鬼牌、恐龍牌和人魚牌執行同樣流程。

name: Grim Captain's Call
originalText: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.

rulings.text: Grim Captain’s Call doesn’t target the cards to return. You choose them while it’s resolving. No players may take actions between the time you make each choice and the time you return each card to your hand.

If a card in your graveyard has more than one of these types (such as a Dinosaur that’s a Vampire Dinosaur due to Arcane Adaptation’s effect), you may choose to return it for one of its types and return another card of the other type.
If you don’t have a card in your graveyard of one of the listed creature types, you just continue to the next listed type.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

text: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.
